de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.onedimensional

Class KNNKernelDensityMinimaClustering<V extends NumberVector<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<Clustering<ClusterModel>>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.onedimensional.KNNKernelDensityMinimaClustering<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, ClusteringAlgorithm<Clustering<ClusterModel>>, Parameterizable

    public class KNNKernelDensityMinimaClustering<V extends NumberVector<?>>
extends AbstractAlgorithm<Clustering<ClusterModel>>
implements ClusteringAlgorithm<Clustering<ClusterModel>>
    Cluster one-dimensional data by splitting the data set on local minima after performing kernel density estimation.
